speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0467/2006 ) by Mrs Hall, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, entitled ‘Towards a European policy on the radio spectrum’ ( 2006/2212(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0467/2006 ) by Mrs Hall, on behalf of the Committee on Industry, Research and Energy, entitled ‘Towards a European policy on the radio spectrum’ ( 2006/2212(INI) ).
